QuestData.Title: Abuse of Power
QuestData.Description: $n? Eitrigg here.$b$bIt sounds like you have earned Thorg'izog's trust, and he's assigned you to discipline duty. This is fortunate.$b$bWe need you to take out his sergeants. You'll find them on wolfback, outside of the Blackrock Stronghold in the Fields of Honor. Use that cudgel on them, several times, until they die. You'll have to act fast, because if they realize you're not one of them, they can unmask you. Strike quickly and ferociously, $n.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Time to turn the tables on these sergeants.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: It is done. Nice form, by the way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 5 Blackrock Sergeants using the Blackrock Cudgel of Discipline. Defeat them quickly, before they have a chance to unmask you.
QuestData.RewardText: Without those sergeants, Thorg'izog will be hard-pressed getting his troops ready for battle.$b$bAlready the dominoes are beginning to fall, $n.
